title: "NIKL for SSP"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
NIKL <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/NIKL.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
nikl <- ts(NIKL[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+128/365.25)
nikl %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(nikl))
```

```{r}
training_nikl <- subset(nikl, end=length(nikl)-3)
test_nikl <- subset(nikl, start=length(nikl)-2)
fc_training_nikl<-forecast(training_nikl)
fc_training_nikl %>%
  forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_nikl)
```

```{r}
fc_training_nikl
```

```{r}
fc_nikl<-forecast(nikl)
fc_nikl %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_nikl
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_nikl)
```
